    • Constructor Detail

      • knife

        public knife(double x,
             double y,
             double width,
             double height,
             boolean isEnemy)
        This is the constructor of this class having all the arguments same as the tile class plus a isEnemy boolean.
        Parameters:
        x - X position of the knife.
        y - Y position of the knife.
        width - Width of the hitbox of the knife.
        height - Height of the hitbox of the knife.
        isEnemy - Boolean that contains if the knife is an enemy knife or one thrown by the player.

    • Method Detail

      • update

        public void update(java.util.ArrayList<knifeThrow.tile> platforms)
        This is the update method overridden from the tile class to include some changes exclusive to knives.
        Overrides:
        update in class knifeThrow.tile
        Parameters:
        platforms - This is the array list of objects with which the knife can collide with.

      • fill

        public void fill(java.awt.Graphics2D g)
        This method renders the knife sprite onto the screen.
        Overrides:
        fill in class knifeThrow.tile
        Parameters:
        g - This is the graphics2D object used to draw the sprite on the screen.
